snippet: The market found support from a rebound in airline stocks and encouraging earnings from Domino’s Pizza, Citigroup and others.
abstract: Stock market stabilizes after three days of heavy losses.
lead_paragraph: The market found support from a rebound in airline stocks and encouraging earnings from Domino’s Pizza, Citigroup and others.

headline.main: Earnings Season and Surge by Airlines Give Investors Break From Volatility
headline.print_headline: Earnings Season and Surge by Airlines Give Investors Break From Volatility
